homeThreeHero.title: Hi, I am Muhammad Sarfaraz
homeThreeHero.text: I am a PhD Scholar, Microsoft International Certified AI Developer, and the CEO of SoftechSol. With over 7 years of experience in web development, I provide high-quality services in Web Development, App Development, Social Media Marketing, and AI Development.

aboutData.title: Hi There! I'm Muhammad Sarfaraz
aboutData.subtitle: Full Stack Developer | AI Specialist | Graphic Designer | Social Media Marketing Expert | Cloud Computing Specialist
aboutData.text: I am a PhD Scholar, Microsoft International Certified AI Developer, and the CEO of SoftechSol. With over 7 years of experience in web development, I provide high-quality services in Web Development, App Development, Social Media Marketing, and AI Development.

services.title: AI Development
services.text: Building intelligent solutions using machine learning and AI technologies. Specializing in Python, TensorFlow, and OpenCV to create innovative AI-powered applications.

services.title: Web Development
services.text: Creating responsive and interactive web applications using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Delivering clean code and pixel-perfect designs with modern web technologies.

services.title: Software Development
services.text: Developing robust applications using C, C++, and other programming languages. Building efficient solutions with clean architecture and best practices.

services.title: Problem Solving
services.text: Applying creative problem-solving approaches to tackle complex challenges. Using algorithmic thinking and innovative solutions to deliver effective results.

services.title: Team Leadership
services.text: Leading teams with discipline and collaboration. Fostering teamwork and driving projects to success through effective communication and hard work.

services.title: Full-Stack Solutions
services.text: Delivering end-to-end solutions from frontend to backend. Combining AI capabilities with web technologies to create comprehensive digital experiences.

skillData.title: All the skills that I have in that field of work are mentioned.
skillData.text: As a Full Stack Developer, AI Specialist, and CEO of SoftechSol with over 7 years of experience, I bring expertise across web development, AI/ML, graphic design, social media marketing, and cloud computing. My diverse skill set enables me to deliver comprehensive digital solutions.

portfolioItems.title: Data-driven paid marketing campaigns
portfolioItems.subTitle: ROI focused meta Ads campaign to grow your small business to scale it

portfolioItems.title: Increased reach and messaging conversations
portfolioItems.subTitle: Increasing reach and  getting more Messaging conversations for businesses with a limited budget

experience.title: Final Year Project - E-Commerce Website
experience.subTitle: MNS-University of Agriculture, Multan
experience.text: A web application that manages a complete online Shop including stock records, purchases, and sales. Tools and Techniques: Python 3, OpenCV, TensorFlow.

experience.title: Term Projects
experience.subTitle: MNS-University of Agriculture, Multan
experience.text: • Exams Schedule Generator Using Genetic Algorithm (Python) • Tic-Tac Game (Unity) • Mobile Application for Online Store (Java, Dart) • Covid Model (Blender) • Library Management System (C#) • Chess Game (C++) • Student Form (Java) • Scientific Calculator (C)

experience.title: Honors & Achievements
experience.subTitle: MNS-University of Agriculture, Multan
experience.text: • Runner up in On-spot programming Organized by ICT club at MNSUAM in 2018 • Awarded Merit Base Scholarship throughout the BS degree • Studentship (Paid Program) from Sep 2021 to August 2022 • President of Mosigala Beats (Music Society) at MNSUAM from Sep 2020 to Aug 2021

contactData.title: Contact Info
contactData.subTitle: Visite my social profile and get connected
contactData.text: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to reach out to me through the contact form or my social profiles. Let's build something amazing together!
